title: 10-MINUTE PESTO CHICKEN GNOCCHI SOUP
directions: In a 3.5 quart soup pot; combine GNOCCHI and CHICKEN BROTH; bring to boil long enough to soften gnocchi (a few minutes).
Reduce heat to med-low; add CHICKEN, PESTO, and SPINACH LEAVES; simmer until ingredients are warmed through (3-4 min); serve warm.
ingredients: 1 cup fresh Spinach (or 1 cup frozen spinach)
